Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD; LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Sarcophagus lid of Djedinhertiuefankh
Description: Fragment of a sarcophagus lid, corresponding to the feet. It terminates at the bottom with a serpent. In the middle are four vertical lines of text which are to be read from the top down, and on both sides are three more lines, starting at the feet and running upwards in reverse. Abundant polychromy. On the back are remnants of a layer of stucco and wooden rods. The owner was a 'godsfather' by the name of Djedinhertiufankh.
